00030 #ifndef ODEPDECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00031 #define ODEPDECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00032 
00033 #include "AbstractConvergenceTester.hpp"
00037 template<class CELL, class CARDIAC_PROBLEM, unsigned DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00038 class OdePdeConvergenceTester : public AbstractConvergenceTester<CELL, CARDIAC_PROBLEM, DIM, PROBLEM_DIM>
00039 {
00040 public:
00044     void SetInitialConvergenceParameters()
00045     {
00046         this->OdeTimeStep = 1e-2;
00047         this->PdeTimeStep = this->OdeTimeStep;
00048     }
00049     /*
00050      * Each new run has the #PdeTimeStep and #OdeTimeStep halved.
00051      * (There is always one ODE step per PDE step.)
00052      */
00053     void UpdateConvergenceParameters()
00054     {
00055         this->OdeTimeStep *= 0.5;
00056         this->PdeTimeStep = this->OdeTimeStep;
00057     }
00061     bool GiveUpConvergence()
00062     {
00063         assert( this->PdeTimeStep == this->OdeTimeStep);
00064 
00065         return this->OdeTimeStep<=1e-5;
00066     }
00067 
00071     double Abscissa()
00072     {
00073         return this->OdeTimeStep;
00074     }
00075 
00076 };
00077 #endif /*ODECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_*/
